overseer_cannot_pickup: The Scarecrow cannot pick up items!

pumpkin_seed.name: Pumpkin Seed
pumpkin_seed.description: A seed that can grow into a pumpkin.

raw_pumpkin.name: Raw Pumpkin
raw_pumpkin.description: A pumpkin freshly taken from the incubator.

pumpkin_lantern.name: Pumpkin Lantern
pumpkin_lantern.description: A lit pumpkin lantern that illuminates the darkness.
